statements: SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE is_encrypted = TRUE;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_content FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 AND is_encrypted = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE message_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 100 ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE receiver_id IN (200, 201, 202) AND is_encrypted = TRUE;
SELECT message_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE message_content LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY message_timestamp;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING total_messages > 5 ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM patients WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT name, email FROM healthcare_providers WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM patients WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY email;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty LIKE '%Surgeon%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, phone_number, medical_history FROM patients WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND medical_history LIKE '%Diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Pediatrics' OR specialty = 'OB/GYN' AND email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Providers
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM Providers
SELECT file_name, file_url FROM FileShares
SELECT message_text, message_date FROM PatientMessages
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_email FROM Providers
SELECT * FROM PatientMessages ORDER BY message_date DESC, message_id ASC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_email FROM Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM FileShares WHERE patient_id = 123 AND provider_id = 456;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT message_text, message_date FROM PatientMessages WHERE message_date >= '2022-01-01' AND message_id % 2 = 0;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, email FROM Providers WHERE provider_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT provider_name, email FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Patients;
SELECT file_name, file_size, uploaded_by FROM Files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, email FROM Providers WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Patients;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS patient_count FROM Providers JOIN Patients ON Providers.provider_id = Patients.provider_id GROUP BY Providers.provider_name;
SELECT * FROM Files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_email FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_phone FROM Healthcare_Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_email FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM Permissions WHERE can_access_messages = TRUE;
SELECT provider_name, provider_email FROM Healthcare_Providers WHERE provider_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT provider_name, provider_email, patient_name, patient_email FROM Healthcare_Providers JOIN Patients ON provider_id = patient_id;
SELECT message_text, message_timestamp FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM Files WHERE file_extension = 'pdf' AND file_size > 10000;
